EmailTemplate.subject: Your Community Solar Bill Is Almost Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
COVID-19 Information: We recognize that the unprecedented COVID-19 situation may be causing financial difficulty. Please contact our Customer Care team if you have concerns about making payments for your Amp Community Solar subscription. Please disregard this notification if you've already sent a check by mail. BlueWave employees are all working remotely, which is causing brief delays in processing check payments.
Just a heads up, your community solar statement is due in a couple of days.
To pay your bill, please log into your community solar portal.
Log Into Your Portal Here
- All of us here at AMP and BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
